data.event: Six minors took the stand in their capacity as alleged victims in rape trials in 2007 and 2008, according to data gathered by The Advocate.
Six minors took the stand in their capacity as alleged victims in rape trials in 2007 and 2008, according to data gathered by The Advocate.
Over the past month, juries acquitted two men accused of sexual conduct with a child younger than 13.

data.event: "At the end of the day, you still need to trust the experience and integrity of the social workers and officers doing the case," Oswalt said.
